Name: Revitalize
Description: Recover 6 HP and 6 EP. Cures most negative effects. Can revive dead allies.
L2 Description: Targets both, heals 9 HP and 9 EP.
Infinite Stacking: Targets both, heals <var,3> HP and <var,3> EP.

Name: Leaf Storm
Description: Deal (4 base) Earth damage to all enemies. (<commontext,explainearth>)

Name: Electro Discharge
Description: Inflict Attack Down 2 for 3 turns to all enemies
L2 Description: Also inflicts Defense Down 2 for 3 turns.
Infinite Stacking: Inflicts Attack Down 2 and Defense Down 2 for <var,1,1> turns.

Name: Mist Wave
Description: Deal (6 base) Water damage to all enemies. (<commontext,explainwater>)

Name: Overheat
Description: Inflict Defense Down 2 for 3 turns to all enemies
Infinite Stacking: Inflicts Defense Down <var,1> for 3 turns and Sunder <var,2>.

Name: Void Crush
Description: Can instakill enemies. Susceptibility is based on enemy hp and enemy level. Enemies with a status are twice as susceptible. Weak enemies you can't get xp from are guaranteed to be instakilled.
L2 Description: Always kills if threshold is above 0, inflicts 6 defocus if it doesn't kill.
Infinite Stacking: Always kills if threshold is above 0, inflicts Defocus <var,6> if it doesn't kill.

Name: Flash Freeze
Description: Inflict Freeze for 3 turns to all enemies (Frozen enemies can't move, but the next hit against them deals 1 more damage and unfreezes them.)
Infinite Stacking: Inflicts Freeze for <var,2,1> turns and Defocus <var,1> and Sunder <var,1>

Name: Cleanse
Description: Remove all temporary buffs from all targets.
L2 Description: Inflicts Seal for 2 turns, which prevents most temporary buffs from being applied.
Infinite Stacking: Inflicts Seal for <var,1> turns, which prevents most temporary buffs from being applied.

Name: Blight
Description: Inflicts 3 turns of Drain Sprout and Bolt Sprout on the target.
L2 Description: Targets all, inflicts the debuffs for 4 turns.
Infinite Stacking: Targets all, inflicts the debuffs for <var,2> turns.

Name: Elemental Conflux
Description: Cures negative effects, applies Attack Up, Defense Up, Endurance Up, Agility Up 2 for 3 turns, Focus 2, Absorb 2 and Burst 2.

Name: Prismatic Blast
Description: Does 15 Prismatic damage in a single hit against all targets.
L2 Description: 30 damage base. Inflicts Attack Down 2, Defense Down 2 for 3 turns, Defocus 2, Sunder 2.
Infinite Stacking: <var,15> damage base. Inflicts Attack Down <var,1>, Defense Down <var,1> for 3 turns, Defocus <var,1>, Sunder <var,1>.
